verses.verse: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־ <S%H835><s%> 'Ash-rei- Blessed הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish, [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor הָלַךְ֮ <S%H1980><s%> ha-laCh that walketh בַּעֲצַ֪ת <S%H6098><s%> ba-'a-Tzat not in the counsel רְשָׁ֫עִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> re-Sha-'Im of the ungodly וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> u-ve-De-rech in the way חַ֭טָּאִים <S%H2400><s%> Chat-ta-'im of sinners לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor עָמָ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> 'a-Mad; nor standeth וּבְמוֹשַׁ֥ב <S%H4186><s%> u-ve-mo-Shav in the seat לֵ֝צִ֗ים <S%H3887><s%> le-Tzim, of the scornful לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יָשָֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav. nor sitteth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> 'im lo בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> be-to-Rat [is] in the law יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God חֶ֫פְצ֥וֹ <S%H2656><s%> chef-Tzo But his delight וּֽבְתוֹרָת֥וֹ <S%H8451><s%> u-ve-to-ra-To and in his law יֶהְגֶּ֗ה <S%H1897><s%> yeh-Geh, doth he meditate יוֹמָ֥ם <S%H3119><s%> yo-Mam day וָלָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> va-La-ye-lah. and night

וְֽהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, will be like כְּעֵץ֮ <S%H6086><s%> ke-'Etz And he shall be like a tree שָׁת֪וּל <S%H8362><s%> sha-Tul planted עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by פַּלְגֵ֫י <S%H6388><s%> pal-Gei by the rivers מָ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim of water אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which פִּרְי֨וֹ׀ <S%H6529><s%> pir-Yo his fruit יִתֵּ֬ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten that bringeth forth בְּעִתּ֗וֹ <S%H6256><s%> be-'it-To, in his season וְעָלֵ֥הוּ <S%H5929><s%> ve-'a-Le-hu his leaf לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יִבּ֑וֹל <S%H5034><s%> yib-Bol; also shall not wither וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- Which יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh and whatsoever he doeth יַצְלִֽיחַ׃ <S%H6743><s%> yatz-Li-ach. shall prosper

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- are not כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> chen so הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> ha-re-sha-'Im; The ungodly כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but כַּ֝מֹּ֗ץ <S%H4671><s%> kam-Motz, [are] not so but [are] like the chaff אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- which תִּדְּפֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5086><s%> tid-de-Fen-nu driveth away רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach. which the wind

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֤ן׀ <S%H3651><s%> ken after that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- Nor יָקֻ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu shall not stand רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> Re-sha-'im Therefore the ungodly בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> bam-mish-Pat; in the judgment וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים <S%H2400><s%> ve-chat-ta-'Im, nor sinners בַּעֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> ba-'a-Dat in the congregation צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim. of the righteous

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יוֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' knoweth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech the way צַדִּיקִ֑ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim; of the righteous וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> ve-De-rech but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im of the ungodly תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> to-Ved. shall perish
